lead_paragraph: The Russian deputy defense minister said that the Kremlin was working to re-establish the former bases, which closed in 2002.

headline.print_headline: Russia Aims to Reopen Vietnam and Cuba Bases
headline.main: Russia Seeks to Reopen Military Bases in Vietnam and Cuba

snippet: The Russian deputy defense minister said that the Kremlin was working to re-establish the former bases, which closed in 2002....
